content.html: Twitter is a private company and First Amendment protections do not apply to it. The same goes for advertisers who vote with their money. In order to fix an issue, you need to understand its parameters. You clearly do not.
content.value: Twitter is a private company and First Amendment protections do not apply to it.  The same goes for advertisers who vote with their money.  In order to fix an issue, you need to understand its parameters.  You clearly do not.
